FuncDef:
The ds-lite user-session create-rate limit enable command enables the limitation on the rate at which packets are sent to create a flow on a DS-Lite device.
The undo ds-lite user-session create-rate limit enable command disables the limitation on the rate at which packets are sent to create a flow on a DS-Lite device.
The limitation on the rate at which packets are sent to create a flow on a DS-Lite device is enabled by default.
CLIs: undo ds-lite user-session create-rate limit enable
ExtraInfo: The limitation on the rate at which packets are sent to create a flow on a NAT device is enabled by default. To disable this function, run the undo ds-lite user-session create-rate limit enable command.
